publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-03 12:09:35 -0400.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.abstract: This small collection contains the collected papers of Mark Rosenthal regarding AFSCME, District Council 37, Local 983. The collection includes clippings, newsletters, election materials, and a discrimination complaint by Rosenthal against the union.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Mark Rosenthal, 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 2008.035.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This small collection contains the collected papers of Mark Rosenthal regarding AFSCME, District Council 37, Local 983. The collection includes clippings, newsletters, election materials, and a discrimination complaint by Rosenthal against the union.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Mark Rosenthal was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Mark Rosenthal Papers; WAG 289; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
